narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
 
This 1st prelicense inspection for a Class 'C' license and exit briefing were conducted with the applicant.
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Applicant and facility meet all requirements to be licensed as a Class 'C' Exhibitor.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
